page.title: 20CHILDREN'S LEISURE TIME
page.content: We interviewed 134 children between the ages of 7 and 11 years to find what they did in their spare time. The results are as follows: {Sport 56% Going to the Park 50% {Swimming 61% Watching TV 77% {Cooking 30% Model Making 23% {Fishing 18% Stamp Collecting 18% {Reading 57% Visiting Friends 55% {Gardening 32% Bike Riding 73% {Horse Riding 9% Cubs/Brownies/ {Pets 53% Scouts/Guides 9% {Board Games 54% Boys/Girls Brigade 4% {Playing a Musical Instrument 14% { From the results of the survey it is clear that children enjoy Sport and Swimming. Over three quarters of the sample watched television. Over half the sample enjoyed reading and going to the Park in their spare time.
